lead_paragraph: The company, the latest in a string of sponsors to drop out, was said to be uncomfortable with Mr. Trump’s comments on trade with China, data encryption, Muslims and immigrants.

byline.contributor: Nick Corasaniti and Jonathan Martin contributed reporting.
byline.original: By MAGGIE HABERMAN and VINDU GOEL

headline.print_headline: Apple, Uneasy Over Trump, Will Not Support Republican Convention
headline.main: Apple, Uneasy Over Donald Trump, Won’t Support Republican Convention

snippet: The company, the latest in a string of sponsors to drop out, was said to be uncomfortable with Mr. Trump’s comments on trade with China, data encryption, Muslims and immigrants.
abstract: Apple joins several other companies in withdrawing its support from Republican National Convention; decision is reportedly due to presumptive nominee Donald J Trump's controversial positions on range of issues.
